00001 //POB-Technology 2008
00002 //move multiple servomotors on dual-pob.
00003 #include <dual-pob.h>
00004 
00005 
00006 int main(void)
00007 {
00008         UInt8 servo = 0;
00009         UInt8 low_speed = 1;
00010         UInt8 high_speed = 7;
00011         UInt8 position[4];
00012         
00013         InitUART0(19200);
00014 
00015         // init dualpob servomotor hardware
00016         InitDualServo();
00017 
00018         SendString("Init dualservo ok\r\n");
00019 
00020         while(1)
00021         {
00022 
00023                 // init position array....
00024                 position[0] = 10;
00025                 position[1] = 10;
00026                 position[2] = 10;
00027                 position[3] = 10;
00028 
00029                 // set servos 2,3,4 and 5 with the position array:
00030 
00031                 SetGlobalSpeed(1);
00032                 SetServoPosition(position, 2, 4 );
00033 
00034                 Wait_Ms(800);
00035 
00036                 position[0] = 255;
00037                 position[1] = 255;
00038                 position[2] = 255;
00039                 position[3] = 255;
00040 
00041                 SetGlobalSpeed(6);
00042                 SetServoPosition(position, 2, 4 );
00043 
00044                 Wait_Ms(800);
00045         }
00046 
00047         return 0;
00048 }
